bib.title: Intrusion detection systems
bib.author: Bace, Rebecca Gurley and Mell, Peter and others
bib.abstract: Intrusion detection systems (IDSs) are software or hardware systems that automate the process of monitoring the events occurring in a computer system or network, analyzing them for signs of security problems. As network attacks have increased in number and severity
bib.publisher: US Department of Commerce, Technology Administration, National Institute of~…
